title: Chelsea F.C.’s New Stadium Will Cost More Than $600 Million
text:
Visit the original post to see all 8 images from this gallery. 
One of the world’s most famous football clubs – Chelsea F.C. – is getting a new stadium planned by Herzog & de Meuron, the same Swiss architecture firm behind the incredible Hamburg Elbphilharmonie Concert Hall .
According to reports, the new stadium will cost around £500 million (($610 million, 576 million euros), and is estimated to be completed by 2020, effectively increasing Chelsea F.C.’s stadium space from 20,000 spectator seats to 60,000. Aesthetically, the design of the new stadium is inspired by Gothic architecture, while Victorian-era brick terraces will wrap around the building.
However, the stadium only recently received approval by Hammersmith and Fulham council’s planning committee, and will still require more approval specifically by London Mayor Sadiq Khan before construction can officially begin.
